    $(function() {
             var pull = $('#pull');
             menu = $('nav ul');
             menuHeight = menu.height();
 
             $(pull).on('click', function(e) {
 
                 e.preventDefault();
                 menu.slideToggle();
             });
 
             $(window).resize(function() {
                 var w = $(window).width();
 
                 if (w > 320 && menu.is(':hidden')) {
                     menu.removeAttr('style');
                 }
             });
         });

         <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
          function performsort() {
                 var s = $get("ctl00_ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ContentPlaceHolder1_scd1_ddlsort");
                 var v = s.options[s.selectedIndex].value;
 
                 var here = window.location.href.toLowerCase();
                 if (here.indexOf('&pagenumber') > 0) {
                     here = here.substring(0, here.indexOf('&pagenumber'));
                 }
                 if (here.indexOf('&sort') > 0) {
                     here = here.substring(0, here.indexOf('&sort'));
                 }
                 window.location.href = here + "&sort=" + v + "#list";
                 return false;
             }
             function gup( name ){  
                 name = name.replace(/[\[]/,"\\\[").replace(/[\]]/,"\\\]");  
                 var regexS = "[\\?&]"+name+"=([^&#]*)";  
                 var regex = new RegExp( regexS );  
                 var results = regex.exec( window.location.href );  
                 if( results == null ){    
                     return "";
                 }else{    
                     return results[1];
                 }

         <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
          function performsort() {
                 var s = $get("ctl00_ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ContentPlaceHolder1_scd2_ddlsort");
                 var v = s.options[s.selectedIndex].value;
 
                 var here = window.location.href.toLowerCase();
                 if (here.indexOf('&pagenumber') > 0) {
                     here = here.substring(0, here.indexOf('&pagenumber'));
                 }
                 if (here.indexOf('&sort') > 0) {
                     here = here.substring(0, here.indexOf('&sort'));
                 }
                 window.location.href = here + "&sort=" + v + "#list";
                 return false;
             }
             function gup( name ){  
                 name = name.replace(/[\[]/,"\\\[").replace(/[\]]/,"\\\]");  
                 var regexS = "[\\?&]"+name+"=([^&#]*)";  
                 var regex = new RegExp( regexS );  
                 var results = regex.exec( window.location.href );  
                 if( results == null ){    
                     return "";
                 }else{    
                     return results[1];
                 }
             }
         </script>

          function performsort() {

                 var v = s.options[s.selectedIndex].value;
 
                 var here = window.location.href.toLowerCase();
                 if (here.indexOf('&pagenumber') > 0) {
                     here = here.substring(0, here.indexOf('&pagenumber'));
                 }
                 if (here.indexOf('&sort') > 0) {
                     here = here.substring(0, here.indexOf('&sort'));
                 }
                 window.location.href = here + "&sort=" + v + "#list";
                 return false;
             }
             function gup( name ){  
                 name = name.replace(/[\[]/,"\\\[").replace(/[\]]/,"\\\]");  
                 var regexS = "[\\?&]"+name+"=([^&#]*)";  
                 var regex = new RegExp( regexS );  
                 var results = regex.exec( window.location.href );  
                 if( results == null ){    
                     return "";
                 }else{    
                     return results[1];
                 }
             }
